history.proof: intros. destruct k as [|k']. - left. split; trivial. sauto lq: on depth: 3. - right. exists k'. qsimpl time: 1. hauto l: on depth: 3.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
instr: Set
data: Type
one_step: instr -> state -> state -> Prop
sss_fun: forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2
sss_dec: forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2}
P: code
k: nat
st3: state
st1: state

Goal:
P//st1-[k]->st3 -> (k = 0 /\ st1 = st3) + {k' : nat | exists st2 : state, k = S k' /\ P // st1 :1> st2 /\ P//st2-[k']->st3}

Premises:

Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope

inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type]
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Prop]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type]
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Prop] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Prop]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?B : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type]

VectorDef.hd : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> ?A where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type] ?n : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_lt : ?p < ?n -> Fin.t ?n where ?p : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat] ?n : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
VectorDef.tl : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n) -> VectorDef.t ?A ?n where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_splitat : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (vw : VectorDef.t ?A (?n + ?m)), VectorDef.splitat ?n vw = (v, w) -> vw = VectorDef.append v w where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.append_comm_cons : forall (v : VectorDef.t ?A ?n) (w : VectorDef.t ?A ?m) (a : ?A), VectorDef.cons ?A a (?n + ?m) (VectorDef.append v w) = VectorDef.append (VectorDef.cons ?A a ?n v) w where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
VectorSpec.eta : forall v : VectorDef.t ?A (S ?n), v = VectorDef.cons ?A (VectorDef.hd v) ?n (VectorDef.tl v) where ?A : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_of_nat : forall h : ?p < ?n, Fin.to_nat (Fin.of_nat_lt h) = exist (fun i : nat => i < ?n) ?p h where ?p : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 ->...-> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- nat]
out_code : nat -> subcode.code ?X -> Prop where ?X : [instr : Set data : Type one_step : instr -> state -> state -> Prop sss_fun : forall (i : instr) (s t1 t2 : state), s ⟬ i ⦒ t1 -> s ⟬ i ⦒ t2 -> t1 = t2 sss_dec : forall (i : instr) (st1 st2 : state), {st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} + {~ st1 ⟬ i ⦒ st2} P : code k : nat st1 : state st3 : state |- Type]

```coq
intros k st1 st3 H.
destruct k as [|k'].
- left. split; trivial.
- right. exists k'. split; trivial.
  apply out_code with (st2:=st1); trivial.
Qed.
```

original: intros k st1 st3 H. destruct k as [|k']. - left. split; trivial. - right. exists k'. split; trivial. apply out_code with (st2:=st1); trivial.
